mapper.insert: insert into tbl_delivery(user_id, delivery_name, delivery_address, delivery_detail_address, delivery_receiver, receiver_phone) values (#{userId}, #{deliveryName}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{deliveryDetailAddress}, #{deliveryReceiver}, #{receiverPhone})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, delivery_name, delivery_address, delivery_detail_address, delivery_receiver, receiver_phone, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_delivery where user_id = #{userId} order by updated_datetime desc
